title: A Shock New Poll Has the Democrats in a Panic (Ep 1332)
description:
In this episode, I address the GOP Convention’s most impactful moment yet. I was moved watching it. I also address a shocking new poll which has the Democrats terrified about their approach to the riots. 

News Picks:


New video evidence shows the shooting in Kenosha from new angles. 

Jacob Blake was armed with a knife, according to the Wisconsin AG. 

As Kenosha burns, local officials tell the Governor to accept Trump’s help. 


President Trump’s election strategy becomes clear at the convention.

Joe Biden’s polling lead has collapsed as he hides in his basement.  


Jim Comey is still a snake, as he continues to duck responsibility.

The NBA boycotts itself.
